Package com.g1t11.socialmagnet.model.farm

Class Plot

java.lang.Object
com.g1t11.socialmagnet.model.farm.Plot
public class Plot
extends Object
Represent a plot.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Plot()
    Creates an empty plot.
    Plot​(Crop crop)
    Creates a plot with specified crop and current time as time planted.
    Plot​(Crop crop, Date timePlanted)
    Creates a plot with both specified crop and time planted.

  • Method Summary

    boolean equals​(Object o)
    Compares the specified object with this plot for equality.

    Gets the crop at plot.

    A method to get the percentage of the progress of the crop getting matured.

    A method to check if the crop in the plot is wilted.

      public Plot​(Crop crop, Date timePlanted)
      Creates a plot with both specified crop and time planted.
      Parameters:
      crop - The crop planted.
      timePlanted - The time crop is planted.

    • readyToHarvest

      public boolean readyToHarvest()

    • isWilted

      public boolean isWilted()
      A method to check if the crop in the plot is wilted. It is wilted when the crop is ready to harvest for longer than its growing time.
      Returns:
      The boolean value of crop in the plot is wilted.

    • getPercentProgress

      public int getPercentProgress()
      A method to get the percentage of the progress of the crop getting matured.
      Returns:
      The integer of the percentage of crop getting matured.

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Object o)
      Compares the specified object with this plot for equality. It returns true if and only if specified object is a plot and both plot have the same crop.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
